body.section: The IHTSDO Classifier is a highly optimised module for performing classification of SNOMED CT. The original classifier code was developed by the Australian E-Health Research Group and was known as "SnoRocket". It has now been incorporated into the IHTSDO Workbench and licenced under the Apache 2 Licence. AEHRC - The Australian E-Health Research Centre. ( http://aehrc.com )
